backend/main.mo: Implements user profiles and listings with access control, supporting CRUD operations and filtered queries.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to source files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files to assist build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme, profile setup, and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: UI button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard component that blocks access to protected pages and shows a sign‑in prompt.
frontend/src/components/images/ImageUrlF: Empty placeholder file for image URL form fields.
frontend/src/components/images/SafeImage: Empty placeholder file for a safe image rendering component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link with dynamic tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, login button, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with header, footer, and an Outlet inside a flex column layout.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Empty file with no implemented component.
Empty file with no implemented component.
Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save a profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/start/NeonStartS: Animated canvas scene rendering neon UFOs, cows, sparks, and a banner using sprite images.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudioContextM: Hook managing Web Audio API music playback, buffering, unlock handling, and dynamic gain updates.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudioContextS: Hook providing synthesized SFX (hiss, boing, laser buzz) using OscillatorNodes with throttling and cleanup.
frontend/src/game/audio/useBeatClock.ts: Generates beat phase timing synced with an AudioContext using a scheduled animation loop.
Empty file with no implemented hook.
frontend/src/game/audio/useMusicTrack.ts: Simple audio element–based music playback hook handling looping, play/pause, and mute state.
frontend/src/game/audio/useSfx.ts: Plays cached HTMLAudioElement-based sound effects with throttle control and stereo panning.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Defines canvas, grid, scoring, spawn intervals, and planet effect constants for the game.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useGameLoop.ts: Defines the main game loop hook, initializes state, updates gameplay intensity, and manages rendering and timing refs.
frontend/src/game/render/canvasDpr.ts: Provides utilities to set up canvas device pixel ratio scaling and retrieve logical canvas size.
frontend/src/game/render/entities.ts: Renders snakes and crocodiles with toon materials, wave animation, and tongue effects.
frontend/src/game/render/obstacles.ts: Renders UFOs, cows, and penguin bosses with toon shading, textures, drift, glow, and fallback visuals.
frontend/src/game/render/sprites.ts: Handles optional sprite loading and provides helpers to draw sprites and animation frames.
frontend/src/game/render/starfield.ts: Implements animated starfield background with twinkling stars and periodic shooting stars.
frontend/src/game/render/toonMaterials.t: Loads toon texture assets and defines material presets for various entities and obstacles.
frontend/src/game/render/toonRenderer.ts: Implements a Canvas-based toon renderer with glow, outline, gradient shading, and circle entity drawing utilities.
frontend/src/game/render/vfx.ts: Provides rendering functions for laser beams, explosions, and score popups using the ToonRenderer.
frontend/src/game/skins/catalog.ts: Defines the SnakeSkin interface and a list of preset snake skins with names, descriptions, and color palettes.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Declares core game types including snake, power-ups, obstacles, bosses, and overall GameState structure.
frontend/src/game/ui/ControlsHintOverlay: Renders an overlay showing control hints for keyboard, touch, and mouse inputs.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameHUD.tsx: Displays score, level, eliminations, and planet/gravity badges in the in-game HUD.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns the current user’s identity, profile, and authentication state using Internet Identity and profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication state and login flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables, dark mode overrides, and custom neon-style utility classes for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/imageUrl.ts: Empty placeholder file for image URL utilities.
frontend/src/lib/listingImagesStore.ts: Empty placeholder file for an image listing store.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseListingsPage.ts: Empty placeholder page for browsing listings.
frontend/src/pages/EditListingPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for editing listings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the neon-styled landing page with hero section, navigation buttons, and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a styled leaderboard using mock data with rank icons and player stats.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailsPage.ts: Empty placeholder page for showing listing details.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Shows local and multiplayer lobby UI with neon styling and placeholders for multiplayer actions.
frontend/src/pages/MyListingsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for displaying user listings.
frontend/src/pages/PlayPage.tsx: Implements the main game page with canvas, audio handling, game loop hooks, and UI controls.
frontend/src/pages/SellListingPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for creating a new listing.
frontend/src/pages/SkinsPage.tsx: Displays available snake skins, ownership state, and UI for selecting or unlocking skins.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from either storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, goals, art direction changes, gameplay requirements, and known issues for the Spacecoco web game.
